EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Powering Enterprise Transformation with Cloud and Data Workshop_KY
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed: Pivotal Powering Digital Transformation Roadshow: Louisville
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT NAME Tagline Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Powering Digital Transformation Roadshow <http://pivotal.io/digital-transformation-roadshow/louisville> in Louisville. Please find the event details below.
Date: May 21, 2015 Time: Registration begins @8:00AM / Keynote begins @9:00AM Location: Louisville Marriott Downtown <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/sdflm-louisville-marriott-downtown/>, 280 W. Jefferson Street, Louisville, KY
{{my.Save the Date Louisville:default=edit me}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:info@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
